Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is spotted with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with self-slip and faint traces of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394927) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394927)
